message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Thank you for offering me the product, Alice. I appreciate the gesture. I am willing to pay $95 for it.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $110.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $100 for the product.
I'm still a bit away from your target price, Bob. I'm willing to compromise further and sell the product to you for $105.
I understand your position, Alice. I am willing to pay $102 for the product.
I'm getting close to your target price, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $107 and sell the product to you for that price.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. I am willing to pay $105 for the product.
